Title: Technology Manager
Company: Dwight School Hanoi
Location: The Manor Central Park, Hanoi, The Manor Central Park, Nguyễn Xiển, quận Hoàng Mai, Hà Nội
Job Description:
Job Overview

The Technology Manager at Dwight School Hanoi leads the planning, implementation, and management of the school's technology infrastructure and strategy. Reporting to the Director of Technology & Innovative Learning, the role includes managing the Tech budget, supervising Tech staff, ensuring cybersecurity and regulatory compliance, and overseeing IT systems and support operations. The Technology Manager collaborates with all departments to integrate technologies that enhance education and administration. Fluency in Vietnamese and English; strong technical, interpersonal, and project management skills; and an ability to clearly communicate technical concepts are essential.

Key Responsibilities
• Developing and implementing the Tech strategy to support the educational and administrative functions of the school.
• Leading the Tech department, including hiring, training, and managing Tech staff.
• Managing the Tech department budget, overseeing inventory tracking and hardware and software deployment, and supporting the school's BYOD program.
• Ensuring compliance with data protection laws and other regulatory requirements, which includes oversight of the implementation and maintenance of cybersecurity protocols, threat detection, data backup systems, and disaster recovery planning.
• Serving as the primary liaison between the Tech department and other departments, as well as with external vendors and stakeholders.
• Overseeing the installation, configuration, maintenance, and security of the school’s technology infrastructure, including servers, Wi-Fi networks, and cloud-based services.
• Supervising the helpdesk operations to provide timely and effective technical support for the school community.
• Supporting the maintenance of core software platforms, including Google Workspace, Toddle LMS, Veracross SIS, and other educational/administrative tools.
• Collaborating on long-term planning to integrate emerging technologies that enhance teaching, learning, and school operations.
• Assist with technology tasks related to MOET/DOET compliance, reporting, and regulatory requirements.
N.B.: These key responsibilities are not intended to be all-inclusive. The Technology Manager may be required to perform other related duties assigned by their manager to meet the ongoing needs of the organization.
Job Requirements:
• Bachelor’s degree or above in Information Technology/Computer Science or related field
• At least four years of experience working in an equivalent position
• Fluent in written and spoken Vietnamese and English
• High level of ICT skills and understanding of ICT infrastructure and networks
• Strong organizational and project management skills
• Analytical and strategic thinking with the ability to troubleshoot complex technical issues
• Excellent interpersonal skills with the ability to collaborate across departments
• A commitment to continuous improvement and staying current with emerging technologies
• Good communication and teamwork skills
• Flexible and agile working style suitable for a greenfield school’s operations
• Strong drive for organizational improvements
• Problem-solving abilities
• Project management skills (especially when rolling out new systems)
• Ability to translate tech language for non-tech users

Commitment to Child Safety at Dwight School Hanoi
At Dwight School Hanoi, the safety and well-being of our students are paramount. All employees are expected to fully embrace and adhere to our Child Protection and Safeguarding Policy, ensuring a secure and supportive environment for every student.

Title: Associate Director, Data & Digital
Company: FWD Vietnam Life Insurance Company Limited
Location: 11th Floor, Diamond Plaza Building, 34 Le Duan Street, Ben Nghe Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, 11th Floor, Diamond Plaza Building, 34 Le Duan Street, Ben Nghe Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Job Description:
PURPOSE:
Responsible for setting country enterprise-wide data management and analytics strategy, roadmap, process and governance to achieve Data Driven Decision Organization.

Responsible for deploying new digital technologies & platforms to support

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:
• Align digital platforms with Group Digital team & build new digital platforms.
• Set up and operationalize the data lake and business/customer intelligence platform including tools, standards, procedures etc. for effective collection, management and analysis of data across the organization.
• Build AI and ML capability to leverage and turn data into meaningful business insights and distil implications for effective business decisions by senior management and related stakeholders.
• Create and manage business intelligence tools, systems, methods etc.
• Create standardized key business reports and dashboards for review by management and other related stakeholders.
• Collect and analyze business intelligence data (industry, customer, competitors etc.) business decisions for corporate strategy development decisions.
• Produce regular/ad-hoc distribution/customer insight reports with recommendations/ findings for business decisions.
• Develop and implement predictive modelling to strengthen distribution productivity/efficiency and maximize sales from existing customers.

KEY PERFORMANCE INDICATORS
KPIs to measure the success or achievement of this role
• Apply new digital platforms and initiatives.
• Country Data strategy/framework set-up
• Country Data Lake and BI Platform
• Regular business intelligence reports produced (such as business, distribution intelligence reports).
• AI and Data Science Strategy and Roadmap set up and as per agreed with group key stakeholders, target is clear and tangible.
• Customer insights for new opportunity identification and personalized offering
• Agreed targeta by using machine learning and AI.
• Define and execute data science talent strategy, provide individual and team leadership to data scientists to ensure they are growing their capabilities and achieving their career goals
• Team hiring and build up
• Work with group to build data lake and data governance.
Job Requirements:
QUALIFICATIONS / EXPERIENCE
• Bachelor's degree in Computer science, mathematics, statistics or a related business discipline.
• 10+ experience in a data management, digital transformation, business intelligence or data analytics role.
• In-depth knowledge of the industry and different business functional areas.

KNOWLEDGE & TECHNICAL SKILLS
• Good understanding of digital transformation processes and digital platforms.
• Excellent analytical skills, including ability to use appropriate applications for analysing data and defining trends.
• Good understanding of life insurance operational and technical areas is an advantage.
• Statistics Modelling Skill: linear regression, logistic regression, decision tree, neural network, random forest, k-means, ARMA, association rule
• Family with Data Lake technology such as Cloudera, Hortonworks and MAPr.
• Tool: SAS, SPSS, R, Python, Spark, pylearn2, SQL, Talend, ASG
• Effective communication in both English and Vietnamese.
• Problem solving skills, leveraging data insights.
Keyword: FWD Vietnam Life Insurance Company Limited

Title: Phụ Trách Truyền Thông & Marketing Ngành Mỹ Phẩm Chuyên Dụng Cho Spa/thẩm Mỹ Viện
Company: KIRIN CAPITAL
Location: TNR Tower, số 54A Nguyễn Chí Thanh, Láng Thượng, Đống Đa, Hà Nội, Tầng 12A, Tòa TNR Tower, 54A Nguyễn Chí Thanh, P.Láng Thượng, Q.Đống Đa, Hà Nội
Job Description:
Chúng tôi là đơn vị chuyên nghiên cứu, phát triển và phân phối các dòng sản phẩm mỹ phẩm chuyên sâu dành cho spa, clinic và thẩm mỹ viện. Với sứ mệnh mang đến giải pháp làm đẹp hiệu quả, an toàn và cập nhật xu hướng quốc tế, chúng tôi tìm kiếm một bạn Phụ trách Truyền thông & Marketing để đồng hành cùng dự án trong giai đoạn tăng trưởng mạnh.

MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC
Lập kế hoạch & triển khai chiến lược nội dung
• Nghiên cứu thị trường, hành vi khách hàng (B2B: spa, thẩm mỹ viện; B2C: người tiêu dùng cá nhân, Đại lý) và các xu hướng nội dung mới để xây dựng chiến lược phù hợp.
• Xây dựng kế hoạch nội dung định kỳ (tuần – tháng – quý) bám sát mục tiêu kinh doanh và các chiến dịch ra mắt sản phẩm.
• Phối hợp với team Kinh doanh để triển khai nội dung trên các kênh:
→ TikTok, Facebook, Shopee
→ Zalo OA, Email, SMS
→ Google Ads / TikTok Ads / KOC & Livestream (nếu có)
Sáng tạo & quản lý nội dung truyền thông đa kênh
• Viết nội dung truyền thông (social post, PR, landing page, email…) phù hợp từng đối tượng mục tiêu.
• Lên ý tưởng, kịch bản và phối hợp sản xuất video ngắn: demo sản phẩm, feedback khách hàng, hướng dẫn sử dụng, livestream bán hàng.
• Làm việc với designer để thiết kế các ấn phẩm hỗ trợ: banner, poster, clip ngắn, hình ảnh sản phẩm, podcast...
• Đảm bảo đồng bộ hình ảnh thương hiệu trên toàn bộ các nền tảng truyền thông.
Quản lý cộng đồng & tối ưu tương tác
• Xây dựng và duy trì cộng đồng spa/khách hàng thông qua nội dung chuyên sâu, mang tính tư vấn – giáo dục.
• Phối hợp xử lý comment, inbox nhanh chóng và hiệu quả.
• Theo dõi hành vi người dùng để tối ưu nội dung (A/B testing, chỉ số chuyển đổi, tỷ lệ giữ chân...).
Job Requirements:
Kinh nghiệm & kiến thức chuyên môn
• Tối thiểu 2 năm kinh nghiệm làm content marketing, truyền thông hoặc sáng tạo nội dung trong lĩnh vực mỹ phẩm, FMCG hoặc ngành làm đẹp.
• Hiểu biết về social media, các công cụ đo lường hiệu quả nội dung, SEO cơ bản, AI hỗ trợ công việc.
• Có kiến thức nền tốt về sản phẩm làm đẹp, chăm sóc da, hành vi người tiêu dùng trong ngành spa/clinic là lợi thế lớn.
Kỹ năng
• Viết nội dung hấp dẫn, phù hợp từng kênh và mục tiêu (branding – chuyển đổi – viral).
• Kỹ năng tổ chức công việc, quản lý thời gian và làm việc theo kế hoạch rõ ràng.
• Khả năng phối hợp tốt với các bộ phận: Kinh doanh, Thiết kế, Sản xuất nội dung số.
• Ưu tiên năng lực thực chiến và tính phối hợp tổ chức tốt.
Trình độ học vấn
• Tốt nghiệp các chuyên ngành: Marketing, Truyền thông, Báo chí, Ngôn ngữ học, Thương mại điện tử…
• Ưu tiên có chứng chỉ: Content Marketing, SEO, Google Analytics, Performance Marketing...

Nếu bạn là người có tư duy chiến lược, thích sáng tạo nội dung trong ngành mỹ phẩm chuyên sâu, và mong muốn xây dựng thương hiệu bài bản từ đầu – hãy ứng tuyển ngay!

Title: Project Officer on Energy Transition Portfolio Management and Impact Monitoring
Company: The Deutsche Gesellschaft Für Internationale Zusammenarbeit (Giz)
Location: Hà Nội, Việt Nam, 6th Floor – Hanoi Towers, 49 Hai Ba Trung, Hanoi
Job Description:
Duty station: Ha Noi, Viet Nam
Duration: Starting ASAP for 1,5 years contract with the possible extension

As a Project Officer, you will play a key role in managing our growing project portfolio, shaping impact monitoring systems, and supporting technical cooperation activities across the energy transition landscape. You will work across multiple projects and contribute to both strategic and operational tasks.

Main tasks and responsibilities:

Portfolio Management
• Contribute to the strategic development of the ESP portfolio, including concept development and proposal drafting.
• Support internal processes such as digitalization, communications, and internal capacity building.
• Coordinate monitoring, evaluation, and reporting across the cluster and individual projects (e.g., GIZ information systems, reporting to the German government).
• Liaise and network with key energy stakeholders, including ministries, regulators, utilities, development partners, and the private sector.
• Provide cross-cutting support for cluster-wide initiatives and events.

Impact Monitoring and Evaluation
• Lead the further development of ESP’s impact monitoring framework, including coordination with external service providers.
• Collaborate with our communications team to develop compelling impact stories and success cases.

Support to Technical Projects
• Assist in operational implementation of selected technical cooperation activities, including research, event coordination, and knowledge management.
• Contribute to workshops, webinars, and technical analyses.
Job Requirements:
Minimum requirements:
• University degree (BSc/MSc) in energy, public policy, economics, geography, communication or a related field.
• Minimum three years of relevant professional experience, preferably in international cooperation or sustainable development.
• Strong experience in monitoring and evaluation of development projects.
• Excellent written and spoken English; proficiency in German is a strong asset.
• Highly organized with strong analytical, communication, and teamwork skills.
• Proficient in MS Office; experience with digital tools and platforms is an advantage.
• Self-motivated, proactive, and capable of working independently and reliably.


GIZ is committed to create an appreciative work environment, irrespective of age, ethnic background and nationality, gender and gender identity, physical and mental abilities, religion and worldview, sexual orientation and social background. We ensure human resource processes live up to the diverse competencies and talents of all employees, as well as satisfy our performance expectations.

What we can offer to the successful candidates:
• Good working environment
• Competitive compensation and benefits packages, including additional health insurance and 24- hour accident insurance.
• And good policy on training and development
• Policy on flexible working time

And what the ESP program can offer:
• A dynamic and diverse team, driven to advance Viet Nam’s energy transition.
• Opportunities for personal and professional development.
• Access to GIZ’s global network and expertise in energy and climate policy.

Interested qualified candidates are invited to send the GIZ Application Form in English, copies of relevant certificates and references, either by email or by post (to GIZ Office Hanoi, 6th Floor Hanoi Towers, 49 Hai Ba Trung Street, Hanoi, Vietnam) before 10th July 2025.

Note: Please state “Application for the Project Officer_ESP” in the subject line or on the envelope. The short-listed candidates will be contacted within 4 weeks after the deadline. Telephone contact is not encouraged.

Please visit our page Career Opportunities to download the GIZ Application Form and further job opportunities.
To process your application, we collect and process data from you. You may read Our Data Privacy Notice, which provides further information on the data we store, and about your rights, before you continue with your application.


GIZ – YOUR PARTNER FOR A BETTER FUTURE
-------------

As a federal enterprise, the Deutsche Gesellschaft für Internationale Zusammenarbeit (GIZ) GmbH supports the German Government in achieving its objectives in the field of international cooperation for sustainable development. We work in a variety of fields and support our cooperation partners in designing strategies and meeting their policy goals. GIZ Viet Nam is currently engaged in three priority areas: 1) Vocational training; 2) Environmental policy and sustainable natural resource use; and 3) Energy. Gender equality is one of the key values of our company and of the work we do. Fostering gender equality in our project operation and our internal equal opportunity provisions are two strategic pillars of our corporate identity and policy. For further information please visit our website: www.giz.de/viet- nam.

The GIZ Energy Support Programme (ESP) cooperates closely with the Ministry of Industry and Trade (MOIT) and other key public and private actors to advance Viet Nam’s ambitious energy transition. Our work spans policy advice, capacity building, and market development in critical areas such as solar and wind energy, energy storage, coal phase-out, and smart grid development.
Keyword: The Deutsche Gesellschaft Für Internationale Zusammenarbeit (Giz)

Title: QS Engineer
Company: Daewoo E&C VINA
Location: Site Office of High-rise Complex Project at Land Lot K8HH1 situated at Centre of Tay Ho Tay New Town, Xuan La ward, Tay Ho district, Hanoi city, Vietnam, H3-CCV1 Building, Starlake New town, Xuan Tao Ward, Bac Tu Liem District, Hanoi City, Vietnam
Job Description:
• Design Review: Review and analyze construction drawings at each design phase (Concept, Basic, Technical, Engineering) for accuracy and completeness.
• Cost Estimation: Accurately estimate quantities and costs for construction projects, including initial rough estimates for new building projects.
• Material Optimization: Research and identify alternative materials that meet specifications and standards to reduce construction costs.
• Cost Analysis and Reporting: Conduct thorough cost analysis, prepare detailed reports, and perform value engineering on Bills of Quantities (BOQs) and cost estimates.
• Bidding Support: Review and provide expert advice on construction costs to support the bidding process.
• Budget Management: Prepare and maintain comprehensive project budgets, including initial, bidding, and modified budgets.
• Budget Alignment: Ensure budget strategies, policies, and processes are consistently applied across all construction projects.
• Payment Certification: Review and verify Interim Payment Certificates prepared by subcontractors, and prepare Payment Certificates for submission to clients.
• Subcontract Management: Monitor subcontractor performance (direct subcontractors, service providers, purchasing), resolve contractual disputes, and address contract claims.
• Contract Administration: Ensure contract compliance, review, renew, and manage contract terminations.
• Reporting: Prepare and submit weekly and monthly reports to the management board.
Job Requirements:
A. Qualifications:
• Education: Bachelor's Degree in Construction Management, Civil Engineering, Quantity Surveying, or a related field.
• Experience: Minimum of 5 years of experience in construction budgeting, cost management, bidding, and contract administration.
• Language: Fluency in English is essential.
• Industry Knowledge: Preferred experience in the real estate investment/development sector.
• Certifications: Professional Quantity Surveyor (QS) certification is highly desirable.
• Contractual Knowledge: Comprehensive understanding of various contract types and construction contract terms and conditions.
• Technical Skills: Proficiency in cost appraisal, cost modeling, budget analysis, and costing for diverse projects.
• Software Proficiency: Advanced skills in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint), CAD, and other relevant software.
• Industry Awareness: Knowledge of legal, financial, and bidding processes within the real estate industry.
B. Personal Attributes:
• Proactive and Organized: Ability to manage multiple tasks and prioritize effectively.
• Communication and Teamwork: Good communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work effectively both independently and as part of a team.
• Problem-Solving: Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.
• Attention to Detail: Meticulous attention to detail and accuracy.
Field: Kỹ thuật xây dựng/Cơ sở hạ tầng

Title: Kindergarten English Teacher (Vietnamese)
Company: Small Wonder Vietnam
Location: Urban Green, Hiệp Bình Phước, Thủ Đức, Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam, 616/36a Đường Lê Đức Thọ, phường 15, quận Gò Vấp, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, 697 Đường Lê Trọng Tấn, Bình Hưng Hòa, Bình Tân, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam
Job Description:
1. Academic Support
- Lesson planning: research, plan, and prepare quality lesson activities in line with SW curriculum to meet learning objectives and outcomes.
- Create and execute grade level appropriate: free exploration stations, learning centers, arts & crafts, song & dance, indoor play, and outing activities.
- Routine and Academic Updates: daily completion with updated learning contents; upload student pictures & videos on home-school contact system
- Parent Monthly Newsletter: monthly completion with updated learning contents; learning goals and reminders which related to events in upcoming month.
- Student portfolios: gather and file student work, update weekly (minimum 2-3 projects per Unit) in preparation of parent conferences (include photo CD, BMI report).
- Academic report cards (every 6 months): complete quality assessments with professionalism language, grammar, content, & correct format.
- Parent conferences (every 6 months): conduct 20-minute parent conferences in professional manner appearance, language, mannerism.
- Follow daily/weekly/monthly academic schedule for outings, lesson activities, etc.
- Chaperone and lead activities during outings/ field trips and school events.
- Follow policy and expectations for teaching methodologies.
- To supervise the guide teaching staff in class to make sure students’ discipline and safety during class hours.

2. Student Care Support
- Support teaching team with student care tasks: meal times, restroom breaks, nap time prep., and special care needs: medicine, illnesses, etc.
- Lead and collaborate with Vietnamese Program teachers regarding: classroom setup, student management routines.
- Support in school events, outings, celebrations and help in special circumstances: performances, graduations, campus checks.
- Chaperone student dismissal room and escort students out to parents during dismissals.
- Utilize effective classroom management strategies appropriate for student age level, paralleling with school’s education philosophy.
- Follow schoolwide expectations (RRSK) and discipline procedure.

3. Admin Tasks
- Actively participate weekly Teacher’s Meetings.
- Prepare and execute plans for campus student field trips and events.
- Support in new student parent orientation and meetings, classroom preparations.
- Request needed materials by following policy.
- Arrange and organize classroom environment.

Title: Senior Procurement Specialist (Chinese Speaking)
Company: VPDD Ningbo Paramont Creative Digital Technology Tại Việt Nam
Location: Thao Dien Ward, Thu Duc city, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, 42 Ngô Quang Huy, phường Thảo Điền, Thủ Đức, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam
Job Description:
JOB DESCRIPTION:
We are looking for a Senior Procurement Specialist fluent in Mandarin Chinese to join our sourcing team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for identifying and managing suppliers, negotiating competitive purchase terms, ensuring product quality, and coordinating closely with internal teams to support customer requirements and business objectives.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
Supplier Sourcing & Negotiation – 50%
• Identify and evaluate qualified suppliers based on customer inquiries and product specifications.
• Negotiate pricing, payment terms, and conditions to secure favorable agreements while ensuring supplier compliance.
• Assess supplier capabilities, quality systems, and performance metrics.
Product Development & Quality Assurance – 40%
• Collaborate with suppliers to develop and approve product samples according to customer standards.
• Track production timelines and ensure on-time delivery.
• Monitor and evaluate supplier performance to maintain consistent quality.
Market Research & Strategic Reporting – 5%
• Conduct regular market research to stay updated on product trends and sourcing opportunities.
• Provide reports and recommendations to improve sourcing strategies and product offerings.
Cross-functional Collaboration – 5%
• Work closely with internal teams such as Sales, Quality Control, and Logistics to ensure seamless operations.
• Perform other tasks as assigned by the team leader or department head.
Job Requirements:
QUALIFICATIONS
Required:
• Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Supply Chain Management, or a related field.
• Minimum 3 years of experience in procurement, sourcing, or supply chain operations.
• Fluency in Mandarin Chinese – mandatory for supplier communication.
• Good command of English (both written and verbal).
• Strong negotiation, problem-solving, and decision-making skills.
• Demonstrated leadership capability with the ability to lead teams and drive results effectively.
• Solid understanding of supplier evaluation, compliance, and quality control processes.
• Ability to manage multiple priorities in a fast-paced environment.
Preferred:
• Experience working with Chinese suppliers or in multinational environments.
• Strong Microsoft Excel and reporting skills.

BENEFITS
• Competitive salary package with performance-based bonuses.
• 13th-month salary and annual performance bonus.
• Full social insurance & healthcare insurance.
• Phone and travel allowances as per company policy.
• International working environment with cross-border collaboration.
• Clear career advancement opportunities to senior or managerial levels.
• Opportunities for domestic and overseas business trips (e.g., China, Southeast Asia).
Keyword: Thu Mua & Quản Trị Hàng Tồn Kho
VPDD Ningbo Paramont Creative Digital Technology Tại Việt Nam
Industry1: Thu Mua & Quản Trị Hàng Tồn Kho

• Phát triển và thực hiện các kế hoạch thử nghiệm sản phẩm.
• Đảm bảo tuân thủ các yêu cầu theo quy định, bao gồm các quy định của Asean và toàn cầu, và duy trì kiến thức cập nhật về các quy định và hướng dẫn của ngành.
• Hợp tác với các bộ phận khác bao gồm Marketing, Operations và QA/QC, để đảm bảo sản phẩm đáp ứng nhu cầu của khách hàng và được sản xuất hiệu quả.
• Quản lý và hỗ trợ kỹ thuật các thành viên nhóm R&D.
• Chuẩn bị và trình bày các bài thuyết trình cho các bên liên quan để truyền đạt tiến độ và kết quả phát triển sản phẩm.
• Lưu giữ hồ sơ về các thí nghiệm, quy trình và kết quả theo các quy trình vận hành tiêu chuẩn (SOP).
• Phát triển và duy trì mối quan hệ với các nhà cung cấp để tìm nguồn nguyên liệu và công nghệ mới.
R&D Supervisor will be responsible for supporting the research and development of new and existing personal care products, specifically in the skincare, haircare, and body care categories. This includes assisting in the formulation, testing, and analysis of products, as well as ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements. R&D Supervisor will also support the R&D Manager in managing the day-to-day activities of the R&D team. Key Responsibilities:
• Support the formulation and development of new personal care products, specifically in the skincare, haircare, and body care categories, including conducting market research and identifying new ingredients and technologies.
• Develop and execute product testing plans, including stability and compatibility testing, and interpret results.
• Ensure compliance with regulatory requirements, including Asean and global regulations, and maintain up-to-date knowledge of industry regulations and guidelines.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including marketing, operations, and quality assurance, to ensure products meet customer needs and are produced efficiently.
• Manage and mentor junior R&D team members and provide technical guidance and support.
• Prepare and deliver presentations to internal and external stakeholders to communicate product development progress and results.
• Maintain accurate records of experiments, procedures, and results in accordance with standard operating procedures (SOPs).
• Develop and maintain relationships with external suppliers and vendors to source ingredients and technologies.
Job Requirements:
• Tốt nghiệp Đại học các chuyên ngành Hóa hoặc chuyên ngành liên quan.
• Tối thiểu 4 đến 5 năm kinh nghiệm trong ngành chăm sóc cá nhân, tập trung vào nghiên cứu và phát triển các sản phẩm chăm sóc da, chăm sóc tóc hoặc chăm sóc cơ thể.
• Kiến thức tốt về các sản phẩm, thành phần và công nghệ chăm sóc cá nhân, đặc biệt là các sản phẩm chăm sóc da, chăm sóc tóc và chăm sóc cơ thể.
• Kỹ năng phân tích và kinh nghiệm trong thử nghiệm và phân tích sản phẩm.
• Hiểu biết về các yêu cầu theo quy định và tuân thủ trong ngành chăm sóc cá nhân, đặc biệt là các sản phẩm chăm sóc da, chăm sóc tóc và chăm sóc cơ thể.
• Khả năng làm việc độc lập và làm việc nhóm, có kỹ năng giao tiếp tốt.
• Kỹ năng quản lý dự án tốt, có khả năng ưu tiên các nhiệm vụ và đáp ứng thời hạn.
• Thành thạo Microsoft Office và các ứng dụng phần mềm liên quan khác.
• Linh hoạt trong việc đi công tác khi cần thiết.

• Bachelor's degree in Chemistry or a related field.
• Minimum of 4 to 5 years of experience in the personal care industry, with a focus on research and development for skincare, haircare or body care products.
• In-depth knowledge of personal care products, ingredients, and technologies, specifically for skincare, haircare, and body care products.
• Strong analytical skills and experience in product testing and analysis.
• Understanding of regulatory requirements and compliance in the personal care industry, specifically for skincare, haircare, and body care products.
• Ability to work independently and as part of a team, with excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
• Strong project management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines.
• Proficient in Microsoft Office and other relevant software applications.
• Flexibility to travel as needed.
• Experience in Personal care Industry is must.

Title: Tổng Giám Đốc Tập Đoàn
Company: Tập Đoàn Karofi Holding
Location: Hudland Tower, Hoàng Liệt, Hoàng Mai, Hà Nội, Việt Nam, Lim Tower 2, 62A Cách Mạng Tháng 8, phường 6, Quận 3, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, Tầng 7 - Hudland Tower - Số 6 Nguyễn Hữu Thọ - Hoàng Liệt - Hoàng Mai - Hà Nội
Job Description:
Trên hành trình xây dựng tổ chức vững mạnh, không ngừng phát triển để thực hiện tầm nhìn 2040 trở thành Top 1 Toàn cầu ngành Nước; Tecomen Holding tìm kiếm anh chị cấp cao cho vị trí Tổng Giám Đốc Tập Đoàn với mục tiêu chính như sau:

- Chịu trách nhiệm toàn diện trước HĐQT về hiệu quả hoạt động và sự phát triển bền vững của Tập đoàn Tecomen Holding.
- Điều hành và giám sát toàn bộ các hoạt động của Tập đoàn, bao gồm nhóm Công ty R&D, các nhà máy sản xuất và các Công ty thương mại.
- Định hướng chiến lược, đảm bảo tối ưu hóa hoạt động vận hành và gia tăng giá trị cho các công ty thành viên, từ nghiên cứu, sản xuất đến thương mại.

I. NHIỆM VỤ CHÍNH:
- Định hướng chiến lược:
+ Xây dựng và triển khai chiến lược phát triển toàn diện cho Tập đoàn, bao gồm lĩnh vực nghiên cứu, sản xuất và thương mại.
+ Đề xuất và thực thi các mục tiêu ngắn hạn và dài hạn, phù hợp với tầm nhìn và sứ mệnh của Tập đoàn.
+ Lãnh đạo việc thực hiện các kế hoạch nhằm tăng trưởng doanh thu, lợi nhuận và thị phần.
- Quản lý hoạt động nghiên cứu và phát triển (R&D):
+ Giám sát và định hướng hoạt động của nhóm công ty R&D, đảm bảo phát triển các sản phẩm tiên tiến và đáp ứng nhu cầu thị trường.
+ Chỉ đạo việc ứng dụng công nghệ mới vào sản phẩm và quy trình sản xuất.
- Quản lý sản xuất:
+ Điều hành và giám sát hiệu quả hoạt động của các nhà máy sản xuất, đảm bảo hiệu suất cao và tối ưu hóa chi phí.
+ Đảm bảo quy trình sản xuất đáp ứng các tiêu chuẩn chất lượng và an toàn lao động.
+ Tăng cường tự động hóa và sử dụng công nghệ tiên tiến trong sản xuất để nâng cao năng suất.
- Quản lý thương mại:
+ Chỉ đạo và giám sát nhóm công ty thương mại trong việc phát triển kênh phân phối, mở rộng thị trường và gia tăng thị phần.
+ Đề xuất các chiến lược kinh doanh và marketing hiệu quả, đảm bảo tăng trưởng doanh số và nhận diện thương hiệu.
+ Duy trì và phát triển mối quan hệ hợp tác với các đối tác, đại lý và nhà phân phối quan trọng.
- Quản trị tài chính:
+ Lập và quản lý ngân sách toàn Tập đoàn, đảm bảo tăng trưởng lợi nhuận và phát triển bền vững.
+ Theo dõi và kiểm soát hiệu quả tài chính của các công ty thành viên, kịp thời đề xuất các giải pháp cải thiện khi cần thiết.
+ Giám sát hoạt động đầu tư và các dự án phát triển lớn của Tập đoàn.
- Quản trị nhân sự:
+ Xây dựng và phát triển đội ngũ nhân sự chủ chốt tại các công ty thành viên.
+ Thúc đẩy văn hóa đổi mới, sáng tạo và tinh thần trách nhiệm trong toàn Tập đoàn.
+ Đảm bảo công tác tuyển dụng, đào tạo và giữ chân nhân tài theo chiến lược dài hạn.
Job Requirements:
- Trình độ học vấn: Tốt nghiệp các chuyên ngành Quản trị Kinh doanh, Kinh tế, Kỹ thuật hoặc các lĩnh vực liên quan.

- Kinh nghiệm: Có kinh nghiệm điều hành tại các Tập đoàn đa ngành lớn ở Việt Nam và Thế Giới. Ưu tiên nhưng không giới hạn ở lĩnh vực Thương mại, Công nghệ, Sản xuất,...

- Kỹ năng:
+ Kỹ năng lãnh đạo và quản lý đội ngũ hiệu quả.
+ Kỹ năng hoạch định chiến lược và ra quyết định.
+ Tư duy phân tích sâu sát và nhạy bén với sự thay đổi.
+ Thành thạo tiếng Anh và các công cụ phân tích quản trị doanh nghiệp.
Level: Giám Đốc và Cấp Cao Hơn

Title: Assistant Marketing Manager- Food Solutions
Company: Công Ty TNHH Fonterra Brands Việt Nam
Location: Bitexco Financial Tower, No. 2 Hai Trieu, Ben Nghe Ward, 1 District Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, Lầu 9, Tòa nhà Bitexco, số 2 Hải Triều, P. Bến Nghé, Quận 1, Tp.HCM
Job Description:
• Demonstrated experience in the food or food ingredients industry, with a strong focus on B2B environments.
• A minimum of 3 years’ experience in customer marketing or product branding, ideally within the food sector.
• Proven ability to design and execute impactful marketing initiatives that drive measurable business outcomes.

Role purpose
The Foodservice business is a key growth pillar for Fonterra Brands Vietnam with ambitious targets to achieve double-digit growth in both volume and EBIT annually. This role plays a critical part in driving channel expansion and customer engagement across the Foodservice segment.
As Assistant Marketing Manager, you will be responsible for developing and executing customer-centric marketing strategies that enhance brand visibility, deepen customer engagement, and boost sales performance. Acting as a vital link between brand marketing and sales, you will ensure that all initiatives are tailored to customer needs and channel dynamics.

Key Accountabilities

1. Strategic Marketing Planning
• Develop and implement customer and channel-specific marketing strategies in collaboration with the sales team to meet business growth targets.
• Lead go-to-market plans for new product launches and seasonal campaigns.
• Analyze market trends, consumer insights, and competitive activity to identify growth opportunities and inform annual planning.
• Align product offerings with market demand through close collaboration with sales, advisory chefs, and operations teams.

2. Customer Engagement & Activation
• Plan and execute nationwide and seasonal campaigns, trade shows, events, and customer engagement programs.
• Partner with Technical Advisors to develop new menu ideas and organize technical demonstrations and workshops.
• Support new product launches with tailored marketing materials and presentations for key accounts, enabling customers to effectively market AFP products.
• Manage event logistics, materials, and post-event reporting to ensure strong ROI and a seamless customer experience.

3. Product Innovation & Category Management
• Support the FS Marketing Manager in category management and market intelligence initiatives.
• Analyze customer data to generate insights that inform marketing strategies and product positioning.
• Drive innovation within the product portfolio as part of long-term strategic planning.
• Develop sales tools, POS materials, and finished goods concepts in collaboration with the Chefs Team.
• Coordinate the development and approval of Vietnam-specific product artwork with Regulatory and Global teams.
• Participate in cross-functional project teams for new product development using the Phase-Gate process.

4. Marketing Budget & Performance Management
• Prepare monthly, quarterly, and annual dashboards and insight reports for internal stakeholders.
• Track and optimize marketing performance, including campaign KPIs, customer engagement, and sales impact.
• Manage the marketing budget, ensuring efficient resource allocation and strong ROI across initiatives.
Job Requirements:
About You
• Degree in Marketing or Business.
• Minimum 3 years of experience in customer marketing or product branding, Experience in the food or food ingredients industry, particularly in B2B environments.
• Proven track record of delivering impactful marketing initiatives.
• Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
• Analytical, creative, and highly organized.
• Self-motivated with strong planning and implementation capabilities.
• Able to make decisions, build consensus, and manage multiple priorities effectively.
• Proficient in written and spoken English.
• Proficient in Microsoft PowerPoint, Excel (including pivot tables), and Word.
Keyword: Nghiên Cứu & Phân Tích Thị Trường
Công Ty TNHH Fonterra Brands Việt Nam

Title: Director of R&D Company
Company: Tập Đoàn Karofi Holding
Location: Từ Hồ, Yên Mỹ, Hưng Yên, Việt Nam, Hudland Tower, Hoàng Liệt, Hoàng Mai, Hà Nội, Việt Nam, Tầng 7 - Hudland Tower - Số 6 Nguyễn Hữu Thọ - Hoàng Liệt - Hoàng Mai - Hà Nội
Job Description:
I. Key Responsibilities:
1. Develop R&D Strategy
- Formulate and execute mid-to-long-term R&D strategies that align with the company’s vision.
- Ensure R&D activities meet market demands and leverage emerging technologies.
2. Lead and Develop R&D Team
- Recruit, train, and manage a high-performing R&D team (over 100 engineers).
- Foster an innovative and collaborative working environment.
3. Product Development
- Oversee the full product development cycle—from ideation, design, and testing to commercialization.
- Incorporate cutting-edge technologies into new product development
4. Technology and Process Optimization
- Recommend and implement advanced technologies to improve manufacturing efficiency and product quality.
- Ensure all new products comply with international standards for safety, quality, and performance.
5. Budget and Resource Management
- Build and manage R&D budgets with effective allocation and cost control.
- Evaluate project ROI and make informed investment decisions.
6. Cross-functional Collaboration
- Work closely with Production, Sales, and Marketing to ensure new products are aligned with customer needs and market trends.
- Support product launches and contribute to marketing strategy development.

II. Benefits:
- Competitive and flexible salary, negotiable based on the candidate’s qualifications.
- Full support provided by the company for travel, accommodation, daily living expenses, and necessary equipment for work.
- Lead a large team of engineers, with over 100 skilled engineers.
- Involvement in diverse projects, including air conditioners, air purifiers, water purifiers, household appliances, and kitchen devices.
- Convenient working conditions, with the largest self-sustaining water purifier manufacturing plant in Southeast Asia. A second plant is expected to open in 2025.
- Direct collaboration with the Chairman of the Group, who highly values R&D activities.
Job Requirements:
- Education and Experience
+ Bachelor's degree or higher in relevant fields such as Engineering, Technology, Product Management, or equivalent.
+ At least 15 years of experience in R&D, including 5 years in senior management roles.
- Technical Expertise
+ Extensive knowledge of R&D processes, product development, and modern production technologies.
+ Proven ability to manage and develop teams of engineers and R&D professionals.
- Leadership Skills
+ Strong management and leadership skills with the ability to develop and lead teams effectively.
+ Problem-solving and decision-making skills in a fast-paced technological environment.
- Languages: Proficiency in English is preferred. Additional language skills, such as Chinese, Korean, or Japanese, would be an advantage.
Level: Giám Đốc và Cấp Cao Hơn

Title: Group Deputy CEO - Head of Manufacturing
Company: Tập Đoàn Karofi Holding
Location: Tòa nhà Hudland, Nguyễn Hữu Thọ, Hoàng Mai, Hà Nội, Việt Nam, Tầng 7 - Hudland Tower - Số 6 Nguyễn Hữu Thọ - Hoàng Liệt - Hoàng Mai - Hà Nội
Job Description:
- LOCATION: Group Headquarters (Hanoi), with frequent travel to domestic and international factories
- REPORTS TO: Group CEO / Group Chairman
- DIRECT REPORTS: General Directors of Plants, Deputy General Directors of Manufacturing, and other key functional Directors such as Production, Quality, Engineering & Maintenance, and Planning & Supply.
- JOB OBJECTIVE: Oversee and optimize the operations of the Group’s existing manufacturing facilities while leading the expansion of production capabilities, including planning and launching new smart factories with advanced technologies, automation, and digital transformation.

I. KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
A. Factory Operations & Optimization
- Supervise operations across all existing plants to ensure efficiency in quality, cost, productivity, and delivery timelines.
Implement and continuously improve modern manufacturing systems such as LEAN, TPM, 6 Sigma, Kaizen, etc.
- Oversee maintenance activities, occupational safety, and regulatory compliance at all facilities.
- Analyze and optimize equipment performance, material flow, and energy utilization.
B. Expansion of Manufacturing Network
- Lead investment and execution of new plant construction projects within Vietnam and across the region, from planning to commissioning.
- Design and implement factories aligned with smart manufacturing principles, including automation, AI, and digital systems.
- Collaborate with technology providers, equipment vendors, and contractors to ensure quality and on-time project delivery.
C. System Governance & Team Development
- Establish and standardize a comprehensive manufacturing management system across the Group.
- Build and develop future plant leadership and promote a lean, high-performance operations culture.
- Work closely with R&D, Sales, and Supply Chain departments to ensure alignment with product development and business expansion plans.
D. Strategic Reporting & Advisory
- Analyze production data and generate regular reports to advise the CEO/Chairman on manufacturing strategies and policies.
- Propose investments in machinery, technology, and systems to improve competitiveness and efficiency.

II. BENEFITS
- Competitive and negotiable compensation package, including base salary, performance bonuses and potential equity participation.
- Full executive authority in manufacturing management and new factory development.
- Opportunity to lead one of the most advanced production systems in Southeast Asia.
- Play a key role in shaping the Group’s global manufacturing strategy and expansion.
Job Requirements:
- Bachelor’s degree or higher in Engineering, Mechanical, Automation, Industrial Management, or related fields.
- Minimum of 15 years’ experience in manufacturing, with at least 5 years in senior executive roles (Deputy CEO of Manufacturing, Group Manufacturing Director, or Multi-plant Director).
- Proven track record in building and operating large-scale factories, especially with smart factory and automation integration.
- Deep knowledge of ISO, LEAN, TPM, and digital transformation tools (MES, ERP, IoT, etc.).
- Strong leadership, strategic thinking, decision-making, and problem-solving skills.
- Good command of English; international experience or working in export-oriented manufacturing is a strong advantage.

Title: Vận Hành Livestream (Live Operation)
Company: CÔNG TY TNHH VITASG VN
Location: Tòa nhà TNL Building, 161 Ung Văn Khiêm, Quận Bình Thạnh, TP.HCM, Tòa nhà TNL Building, 161 Ung Văn Khiêm, Quận Bình Thạnh, TP.HCM
Job Description:
Live Streaming Planning & Execution
• Manage daily operations of TikTok live streaming, including content planning, scripting, and event coordination to maximize performance.
• Monitor live stream performance, analyze key metrics (viewership, engagement, conversion rates), and optimize content and strategies.
• Leverage TikTok’s traffic mechanisms to increase live streaming exposure and enhance organic traffic acquisition.
• Handle product selection, pricing, and promotional planning to boost live streaming GMV and ROI.
Host & Team Management
• Recruit, train, and manage live stream hosts, improving their sales performance.
• Monitor host performance, optimize live selling scripts, and enhance user engagement and conversion rates.
• Coordinate with photographers, video editors, and co-hosts to ensure high-quality live streams.
• Conduct post-stream analysis meetings to summarize learnings and continuously improve team performance.
Marketing & Data Analysis
• Develop TikTok live streaming promotion strategies, leveraging paid ads, influencer collaborations, and community marketing to increase traffic.
• Analyze live streaming data, including watch time, engagement rate, and conversion rate, and propose optimization strategies.
• Stay updated on market trends and competitor strategies, adjusting operations to maintain competitiveness.
• Research TikTok platform rules and incentives to maximize platform benefits.
Job Requirements:
• Language: basic communication in Mandarin or English
• Education: Bachelor’s degree or above in Marketing, Media, E-commerce, or related fields.
• Experience: At least 1 year of experience in TikTok live streaming operations or e-commerce live streaming, with proven sales success.
• Familiar with TikTok live streaming mechanisms, including traffic distribution, engagement strategies, and host management.
• Strong data analysis skills, capable of optimizing strategies based on live stream performance.
• Excellent teamwork and cross-functional collaboration skills.
• Highly adaptable, able to thrive in a fast-paced e-commerce environment.

Title: Receivable Accountant - Kế Toán Doanh Thu Ưu Tiên 2 Năm Kinh Nghiệm
Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Giáo Dục Millenia
Location: Phố Dương Khuê, Mai Dịch, Cầu Giấy, Hà Nội, Việt Nam, Cầu Giấy, Hà Nội
Job Description:
JOB SUMMARY
This position is responsible for the daily accounting processes regarding Receivable transaction checking, reconciling receivable accounts, record receivable & bank cash transactions into accounting system.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
1. Receivable accounting:
• Issue Debit Notes/invoices to parents/students in a timely and accurate manner; monitor and follow up on outstanding receivables to ensure timely collections.
• Reconcile monthly receivable balances between the accounting records and actual collections from affiliated units.
• Verify student enrollment data, tuition fee amounts, and payment schedules with affiliated units to ensure accuracy.
• Identify, investigate, and resolve discrepancies in receivables promptly.
• Ensure complete and timely receipt of tuition fees and other related revenues for the university.
• Record daily bank transactions and prepare balance reports. Ensure timely posting of these entries during month-end closing for accurate accounting records.
• Coordinate with GA regarding monthly VAT tax report, receivable transactions,...
• Track and file accounting – related paperwork efficiently
• Communicate with vendors to collect invoices and contracts
• Align with the General Accountant to follow up on due payments and prepare supporting documents for processing.

2. Petty cash:
• Check payment by cash properly and pay out Petty cash.
• Daily input payment by cash entries into accounting system.
• Manage & Reconcile Petty cash transaction in-out balance, including monthly cash count and ensure compliance with regulations and internal policies.

3. Other Responsibilities:
• Coordinate and assist in the auditing process, checking Inventory
• Provide timely information and reports as required.
• Any other tasks assigned by the line manager.
Job Requirements:
Experiences
• Minimum of 2 years of experience in Accounting
• Working experience in university is plus

Qualifications
• Bachelor’s degree in accounting
• Relevant professional certifications are an advantage.
• Having knowledge and experience of VAS is a must.
• Proficiency in Microsoft Excel

Skills & Competence
• Proficiency in accounting software, Microsoft Office especially Excel, and others.
• Good communication and interpersonal skills with the ability to build strong relationships and work collaboratively.
• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with attention to detail.
• Ability to collect, analyze, and summarize data and to prepare clear and concise reports.
• High level of integrity and professionalism with a commitment to ethical standards and practices.

Personality / Attitude
• Positive Attitude: Demonstrates a positive and proactive approach to work, inspiring and motivating others within the team.
• Integrity: Maintains the highest standards of honesty and integrity in all interactions, building trust and respect with colleagues, students, and stakeholders.
• Collaboration: Works effectively with others, fostering a spirit of teamwork and cooperation across the organization.
Keyword: Công Ty Cổ Phần Giáo Dục Millenia

Title: Area Sales Manager - Food Solutions
Company: Công Ty TNHH Fonterra Brands Việt Nam
Location: Bitexco Financial Tower, No. 2 Hai Trieu, Ben Nghe Ward, 1 District Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, Lầu 9, Tòa nhà Bitexco, số 2 Hải Triều, P. Bến Nghé, Quận 1, Tp.HCM
Job Description:
• Proven B2B Sales Experience in a multinational company selling industrial or food products, ideally within the foodservice channel.
• Demonstrated success in distributor, sales force, and customer management, with a preference for experience in dairy product sales.
• Analytical & Execution Excellence

Role purpose
The Vietnam Foodservice business is a strategic growth pillar for Fonterra Brands, with ambitious targets to achieve double-digit growth in both volume and EBIT annually. This role is critical in driving revenue and profitability through the execution of our Route-to-Market (RTM) strategy, distributor development, and customer engagement.

Key Accountabilities

Commercial Planning – Area Level
• Develop and implement RTM strategies tailored to assigned areas, ensuring alignment with AFP Foodservice objectives.
• Set KPIs for the sales team and deploy strategies and tactics to meet business growth targets (topline and bottom line).

Financial & RTM Execution
• Deliver budgeted volume (tons), value (NSR), and profitability (GM, EBIT) through both secondary and primary sales.
• Conduct strategic pricing to manage volatility and drive profitable growth.
• Optimize trade spend (Gross to Net) and ensure efficient resource allocation.
• Expand market reach through effective RTM execution, increasing both geographic coverage and share of wallet in the dairy category.
• Lead execution of RTM strategies, channel plans, and customer activation initiatives to maximize profitability.

Distributor Management
• Lead Joint Business Plan (JBP) execution with distributors in line with strategic goals.
• Continuously evaluate distributor performance and implement corrective actions where needed.
• Set and monitor sales and distribution targets in collaboration with Trade Marketing.
• Oversee daily distributor operations, including inventory, collections, customer service, warehousing, and systems.
• Establish operational and service guidelines for distributors and wholesalers.
• Conduct regular distribution audits and follow up on improvement actions.

Sales Operations & Integrated Business Planning (IBP)
• Own bottom-up sales forecasting from both internal teams and distributor representatives.
• Ensure forecast accuracy using standardized templates and meet FS division KPIs.
• Deliver IBP KPIs, conduct root cause analysis, and communicate insights through pre-DR and DR processes.
• Maintain a robust foodservice database with timely and accurate market intelligence.
• Identify risks and opportunities to improve planning accuracy.

People Management & Capability Building
• Allocate headcount and resources effectively across areas to maximize productivity.
• Recruit, train, and coach the sales team on AFP’s solution-selling methodology and tools.
• Spend significant time in the field providing hands-on coaching to ASEs, distributor CROs, and merchandisers.
• Ensure daily sales routines are followed and sales discipline is maintained.
• Motivate and develop the team through competency assessments and tailored development plans.
Job Requirements:
About You
• Diploma or university degree in Business Management or Marketing
• 3–5 years of experience in a multinational company selling industrial and/or food products in a B2B environment (e.g., Bakery, Beverage, Dining). Experience in the foodservice sales channel preferred.
• Demonstrated experience in distributor management, sales force management, and customer relationship management. At least 2 years of experience selling dairy products to foodservice customers preferred.
• Strong business and commercial acumen
• Detail-oriented with a focus on execution excellence
• Effective leadership and coaching skills
• Analytical thinking with the ability to interpret sales data and market trends
• Strong customer focus and relationship-building capabilities
• Proficient in sales and negotiation techniques
• Adaptable to dynamic, fast-paced environments
• Clear and effective verbal and written communication skills
• Fluent in spoken and written Vietnamese and English
• Proficient in Microsoft Office tools, especially Excel, PowerPoint, and Power BI
• Preferred: Basic cooking and baking skills
Keyword: Công Ty TNHH Fonterra Brands Việt Nam

Title: AR Executive (Account Receivable)
Company: Bridgestone Tire Sales Vietnam LLC
Location: 9th Floor, Bao Viet Building, 233 Dong Khoi Street, Ben Nghe Ward, District 1, HCMC., 9th Floor, Bao Viet Building, 233 Dong Khoi Street, Ben Nghe Ward, District 1, HCMC.
Job Description:
I. Job purpose:
Provides financial, administrative and clerical support by ensuring the company receives payments for goods and services and properly records the transactions by posting receipts and resolving discrepancies according to established policies and procedures in an efficient, timely and accurate manner.

II. Key Responsibilities

1. AR management - 30%
- Check and update gradually Customer payment term in System.
- Monthly discussion with internal team and Managers to reach AR desired results
- Review and propose solutions to improve AR management rules and Credit terms to support sales Execution.
- Check AR status and release S.Os.
- Validate and propose AR proposal to Finance Manager & Managing Director.
- Highlight high risk Debt, overdue Debt (If any) to Sales team and Managers.
- Handle ad-hoc task as Managers requirement.

2. Credit Limits management - 25%
Closely monitor of Bank Guarantee (BG), Credit Insurance, Bridgestone's Credit Limit, Distributor Finance:
- Keep tracking of valid BG by Customers and proceed BG claims (if have) with Banks.
- Proceed the annual renewal of new contract and Actual Turn Over Declaration and handle Credit
- Collaborate with Sales team to review Credit limits of Customers periodically and maintain on SAP.
- Keep tracking of Joiners and remind Sales to encourage Customers to join.

3. Payment reconciliation - 10%
- Update incoming payment in Bank statement/system.
- Booking and clearance daily transaction into system
- Make reconciliation of AR accounting book vs bank statement by Customer.
- Tracking Credit limit (Bank Guarantee, Coface) of Customer, follow up Expiration date of BG.

4. Trade Invoicing - 20%
- Double check Invoice information with Billing and issue Invoice and send invoice to 3PL by timeline.
- Handle issues with invoices following Customers requirement.
- Handle issues with E-invoice system
- Tracking of usage invoices and proceed the E-invoices purchasing.
- Do VAT output report.

5. Monthly task & Reporting - 10%
- Produce AR Monthly report.
- Produce Cash flow report.
- Send AR confirmation to customer (periodically, monthly, yearly).
- Compute and produce report of Customer support amount and late payment.
- Complete month-end closing on time.

6. Other task - 5%
- Stock count scheduling by twice/ year.
- Handle other task, new projections as Managers requirement.
- Gather with teammates to complete Internal Audit / External audit/ company activities.
Job Requirements:
1. Education: Bachelor’s degree in finance, accounting or equivalent.

2. Experience:
- At least 02 years in similar position or above.
- Involve in creating AR management - Credit Limit policy.
- Proficient in MS office and solid experience with SAP.
- Experience at MNCs is a plus

3. Skills:
- Good in problem solving and negotiation.
- Good business mindset to well balance AR management and Sales execution.
- Positive thinking, integrity, accountability and carefulness, passion in Finance - Accounting.
- Hard work, good teamwork, proactive and motivation.

4. Language: English

Title: Trình Dược Viên Kênh Bệnh Viện (ETC) - Ngành Hàng Dinh Dưỡng - Khu Vực Tây Ninh
Company: Abbott
Location: Tây Ninh, 02 Ngo Duc Ke, Dist. 1, HCM
Job Description:
1. Quản lý địa bàn:

- Phát triển cơ sở dữ liệu khách hàng, hồ sơ chi tiết của bệnh viện / trung tâm y tế / chuyên gia chăm sóc sức khoẻ.

- Đánh giá, phân loại và xác định khách hàng mục tiêu, ưu tiên các địa bàn tiềm năng.

- Xây dựng và duy trì mối quan hệ thân thiết với những khách hàng trọng điểm thông qua việc đảm bảo các dịch vụ của công ty được đáp ứng theo yêu cầu.

- Theo dõi xu hướng thị trường và hoạt động của đối thủ cạnh tranh trong địa bàn, báo cáo thông tin thị trường cho quản lý cao hơn và đội ngũ marketing.


2. Phát triển kinh doanh:

- Phát triển cơ hội kinh doanh mới với các khách hàng hiện tại và tiềm năng, đảm bảo thực hiện tốt các chương trình Bán hàng và Tiếp thị trên địa bàn được giao.

- Thực hiện ghé thăm khách hàng hằng ngày một cách hiệu quả, xử lý phản hồi về sản phẩm một cách nhanh nhất.

- Kết hợp đa dạng các hoạt động (thuyết trình, tư vấn về sản phẩm) ở các địa điểm khác nhau: bệnh viện, trung tâm sức khỏe, trường mẫu giáo, cửa hàng thực phẩm, siêu thị và các tổ chức khách hàng khác.


3. Lập kế hoạch và tổ chức:

- Sử dụng thông tin dữ liệu khách hàng cho việc lên kế hoạch chi tiết việc ghé thăm khách hàng theo tuần, theo tháng, theo ngày, phân bổ nguồn lực hoặc các hoạt động tiếp thị trực tiếp đến khách hàng.
Job Requirements:
- Ưu tiên có từ 2 năm kinh nghiệm Trình Dược Viên hoặc trong lĩnh vực chăm sóc sức khỏe

- Tốt nghiệp Đại học ngành Y/ Dược

- Kỹ năng bán hàng, thuyết phục khách hàng

- Kỹ năng giao tiếp

- Kỹ năng quản lý công việc, làm việc nhóm

Title: Customer Services
Company: Circo Co-Working Space
Location: Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam, Level 1 & 2, H3 Building - 384 Hoang Dieu, ward 6, district 4, Ho Chi Minh City
Job Description:
- Khu vực làm việc:
• Trực điện thoại, nhận cuộc gọi từ khách hàng, ghi nhận thông tin khách hàng và báo lại thông tin cho các bộ phận liên quan.
• Quản lý các trang thiết bị như máy tính, máy scan, điện thoại, các loại chìa khóa văn phòng.
• Đảm bảo khu vực lễ tân gọn gàng, sạch sẽ, chuyên nghiệp.
- Hỗ trợ khách hàng:
• Chào đón khách đến, hỏi thông tin, nhu cầu của khách hàng.
• Tiếp nhận các thông tin phàn nàn, phản ánh, góp ý của khách, giải quyết trong thẩm quyền hoặc báo cáo bộ phận liên quan xử lý.
• Lấy thông tin cá nhân, cấp thẻ từ thang máy cho nhân viên CirCO và khách hàng.
• Nhận và gửi thư của nội bộ CirCO, khách hàng.
• Tiếp nhận đăng ký gởi xe cho khách hàng.
• Là đầu mối liên hệ các công việc với khách hàng.

- Lưu trữ thông tin, hồ sơ:
• Cập nhật chi tiết thông tin khách thuê ghế ngồi cá nhân, khách thuê văn phòng lên file lưu trữ.
• Làm Phiếu thu cho khách thuê ghế ngồi cá nhân hay thuê phòng họp (nếu cần).

- Bán hàng:
• Nắm rõ các sản phẩm của công ty và giá bán.
• Nắm bắt nhu cầu khách hàng và tư vấn gói sản phẩm phù hợp (Daily, Flexible Desk, Dedicated Desk) hoặc chuyển qua bộ phận sale.

- Hỗ trợ Team Operations:
• Phối hợp xây dựng các quy trình hoạt động / làm việc hiệu quả.
• Nắm lịch KH nội bộ sử dụng phòng họp.
• Nắm lịch KH ngoài thuê phòng họp có tính phí, hỗ trợ khách hàng khi sử dụng dịch vụ.
• Nắm lịch sự kiện theo ngày / tuần / tháng / quý,…, hỗ trợ team sắp xếp, chuẩn bị cho sự kiện, trực sự kiện hỗ trợ khách hàng trong suốt sự kiện.
• Vận hành được các hệ thống quản lý, hệ thống tương tác online khác của công ty.

Thời gian làm việc và phúc lợi
• Thời gian làm việc: Từ 08h00 đến 18h00 từ thứ 2 đến thứ 6. (nghỉ thứ Bảy và chủ nhật)
• Nghỉ trưa từ 12h - 13h30
• Thưởng giữa năm, thưởng đột xuất
• Tham gia đầy đủ BHXH theo quy định của Pháp luật
• Du lịch hằng năm, sinh nhật, hiếu hỷ,…. Theo quy định công ty
• Khám sức khỏe định kỳ
• Nhiều cơ hội phát triển và thăng tiến lên vị trí cao hơn
• Môi trường làm việc năng động, phòng ốc hiện đại, chuyên nghiệp, đồng nghiệp thân thiện
Job Requirements:
• Có kinh nghiệm ít nhất 1 năm làm ở: vị trí hành chính văn phòng, lễ tân, có kinh nghiệm tổ chức sự kiện, tư vấn bán hàng.
• Có kỹ năng giao tiếp, xử lý tình huống, giải quyết vấn đề, đàm phán tốt.
• Ngoại hình ưa nhìn, giọng nói chuẩn, có kỹ năng thuyết trình tốt.
• Tốt nghiệp Đại học, Cao đẳng.
• Sử dụng tiếng Anh lưu loát.
• Yêu cầu bắt buộc: Khả năng sử dụng PowerPoint, Excel, Word, trình duyệt web thành thạo.
• Giới tính: Nữ.
• Độ tuổi: 23-28 tuổi.
• Mức lương đến 10 triệu/ tháng.

b. Yêu cầu kiến thức

c. Yêu cầu về kĩ năng

• Kỹ năng phát triển chương trình đào tạo (ứng dụng kỹ thuật phân tích nhu cầu đào tạo, xây dựng kế hoạch, chương trình đào tạo, điều phối / kết nối đối tác đào tạo để phát triển chương trình)
• Có khả năng quan sát và thấu hiểu tâm lý nhân sự
• Kỹ năng quản lý, tổ chức và giải quyết công việc tốt

Title: Chuyên Gia Cao Cấp Tài Chính Kinh Doanh (Dự Án Sân Bay Gia Bình)
Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Tập Đoàn Masterise
Location: Khu đô thị Times City, Vĩnh Tuy, Hai Bà Trưng, Hà Nội, Việt Nam, Lumiere West Tower, Thảo Điền, TP. Thủ Đức, TP. Hồ Chí Minh
Job Description:
Tổng quan công việc:
Chúng tôi đang tìm kiếm một Chuyên gia Cao cấp Tài chính Kinh doanh có kinh nghiệm trong các dự án xây dựng và hạ tầng kỹ thuật lớn, phức tạp. Ứng viên lý tưởng sẽ chịu trách nhiệm phân tích tài chính, tối ưu hóa ngân sách, quản lý dòng tiền và hỗ trợ chiến lược kinh doanh nhằm đảm bảo hiệu quả tài chính của các dự án quy mô lớn.

Trách nhiệm chính:
• Phân tích tài chính dự án: Đánh giá hiệu quả tài chính, dự báo dòng tiền và đề xuất chiến lược tối ưu hóa ngân sách.
• Quản lý ngân sách & chi phí: Theo dõi ngân sách dự án, kiểm soát chi phí và đảm bảo tính minh bạch trong tài chính.
• Hỗ trợ chiến lược kinh doanh: Phân tích thị trường, đề xuất mô hình tài chính và hỗ trợ ra quyết định đầu tư.
• Quản lý hợp đồng & thanh toán: Kiểm tra và xác nhận các khoản thanh toán cho nhà thầu, nhà cung cấp và các bên liên quan.
• Tuân thủ pháp lý: Đảm bảo tất cả các hoạt động tài chính tuân thủ quy định kế toán, thuế và pháp luật hiện hành.
• Phối hợp với các bên liên quan: Làm việc chặt chẽ với đội ngũ quản lý dự án, nhà thầu và các cơ quan quản lý để đảm bảo tiến độ tài chính.
Job Requirements:
• Trình độ học vấn: Cử nhân hoặc Thạc sĩ Tài chính, Kế toán, Quản lý Dự án hoặc Quản trị Kinh doanh.
• Kinh nghiệm: Tối thiểu 10+ năm kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực tài chính kinh doanh xây dựng, ưu tiên ứng viên có kinh nghiệm trong các dự án hạ tầng kỹ thuật lớn, phức tạp.
• Kỹ năng chuyên môn: Am hiểu về quy trình tài chính dự án, kiểm toán, quản lý ngân sách và phân tích tài chính.
• Kỹ năng phần mềm: Thành thạo SAP, Oracle, QuickBooks, Microsoft Excel, Power BI.
• Giao tiếp & đàm phán: Kỹ năng giao tiếp xuất sắc, có khả năng làm việc với nhiều bên liên quan.

Kỹ năng ưu tiên:
• Kinh nghiệm trong các dự án hạ tầng lớn như sân bay, cầu đường, khu công nghiệp, trung tâm thương mại.
• Khả năng quản lý nhiều dự án cùng lúc và làm việc trong môi trường áp lực cao.
• Kinh nghiệm trong tối ưu hóa chi phí và quản lý rủi ro tài chính.

Job Description:

• Address any knowledge gaps through learning and adaptation as appropriate
• Contribute to continuous team improvement
Job Requirements:
Requirements:
• Background:
o Graduated from Actuaries Studies
o At least 05 years’ experience in Actuary
o Having knowledge/ experience of Solvency II is a plus
o Professional qualifications: ASA (Associate of the Society of Actuaries), Chartered Enterprise Risk Actuary (CERA) is a plus
o Master’s degree, MBA is a plus

Job Description:
ABOUT US:
ME GROUP is a collaborative content production hub & media powerhouse for local & global creations (TVC & Digital Ad Production, Table-Top & Motion Control, Commercial Photography, Post-production Services, and Influencer-driven creative studio & media platform).

The founders of May & Echo Production have teamed up from these incentives to bring unique international production standards to Vietnam. As a result, ME Group was founded in early 2020. If you're looking for a workplace where creativity and teamwork are valued, we invite you to join our team. You'll have the opportunity to work with a group of passionate and talented individuals, collaborate on exciting projects, and make a meaningful impact on our organization.

Record, manage all accounting transactions.
Prepare the payment documents, payment plan.
Reconcile accounts payable and receivable.

Prepare accounting book and provide accounting data for Auditor.
Consolidate financial statement report.
Other tasks as assigned by manager.

• Chịu trách nhiệm về các hoạt động pháp lý của công ty. Đảm bảo rằng tất cả các hoạt động của công ty đều thực hiện theo đúng pháp luật liên quan, nội quy, quy định và điều lệ công ty, cũng như là nghị quyết của Hội đồng quản trị và các cổ đông.
• Tư vấn, tham mưu cho lãnh đạo Công ty trong việc tổ chức, phân quyền quản lý, điều hành hoạt động của Công ty. Nghiên cứu tìm hiểu, cập nhật thường xuyên các thông tin mới nhất về pháp luật cho Ban lãnh đạo và cấp quản lý.

• Tư vấn pháp lý cho các phòng ban chuyên môn các hoạt động pháp lý phát sinh về dự án bất động sản (Khu-Cụm công nghiệp), đầu tư xây dựng, quản lý, kinh doanh, giao dịch hợp đồng, thương mại.

• Chủ trì làm việc thực hiện các thủ tục pháp lý phát sinh trong quá trình thay đổi đăng ký doanh nghiệp của công ty…

• Am hiểu về phân tích và quản trị rủi ro.
• Kỹ năng thuyết trình và kỹ năng giao tiếp, ứng xử và thương thảo, đàm phán.
• Chính trực, trung thực, tôn trọng đạo đức nghề nghiệp, tuân thủ nguyên tắc bảo mật thông tin, chịu áp lực công việc cao.

Title: EHS Staff
Company: Vietnam Housewares Corp
Location: Bình Phước B, Bình Chuẩn, Thuận An, Bình Dương, Bình Phước B, Bình Chuẩn, Thuận An, Bình Dương
Job Description:
Oversee all occupational health, safety, and environmental matters for the entire plant.

Coordinate with other departments to create a safe working environment, in compliance with governmental Occupational Safety standards and company regulations.

Identify hazards within the plant and propose control measures to management to prevent accidents and incidents.

Monitor work safety, ensuring zero workplace accidents across the facility.

Develop periodic training plans on Occupational Safety & Hygiene for employees.

Organize appraisal and acceptance of safety conditions, fire prevention and firefighting (PPE), safety-critical equipment, personal protective gear, materials, and new technological processes.

Draft policies, procedures, forms, and regulations on environment, occupational safety, hygiene, fire prevention, and accident prevention.

Manage all documents and records related to occupational safety and the environment at the plant.

Conduct internal audits related to occupational safety and environmental compliance across the facility.

Stay updated on the latest state laws and regulations on occupational safety and environmental hygiene.

Carry out safety inspections, handle violations, and monitor corrective actions with departments.

Supervise and ensure wastewater discharges meet regulatory standards before release.

Report operational results to management and internal stakeholders.

Implement policies and regulations to reduce and prevent pollution and other environmental initiatives.

Manage all types of waste, identify and control environmental aspects, and ensure compliance with environmental laws.

Prepare periodic safety and environmental reports for submission to authorities as required by law.

Investigate the causes of accidents and other unsafe conditions in the workplace.

Perform other duties as assigned by supervisors.
Job Requirements:
Bachelor’s degree in Environmental Engineering, Occupational Safety, or a related field.

At least 2 years of experience in a similar position.

Proficiency in all four English language skills (listening, speaking, reading, and writing).

Title: Key Account Manager - Abbott Rapid Diagnostics
Company: Abbott
Location: Melinh Point, Số 2, Ngô Đức Kế, Quận 1, 02 Ngo Duc Ke, Dist. 1, HCM
Job Description:
MAIN PURPOSE OF THE ROLE
Our Sales department is in search of a Key Account Manager to be a part of our team. You should be able to handle multiple customer accounts and provide excellent customer service. Besides, you should also be to gather customer details and understand their requirements. Moreover, you should also be able to build and maintain long-term customer relations.
This role is a critical in conventional channel (public and private hospitals, clinics) and non-conventional channel (Small clinics, retailers & pharmacies; NGOs, CBOs, Govt/MOH channel specific projects, . . .) This is a strong driving role to the commercial team to expand the market for sustainable business growth, for both pre- and post-launched rapid diagnostics products. Implementation and for aligning our activities with public health channel to support disproportionate business growth in Vietnam.
As a Key Account Manager, you should be able to understand customer queries and resolve them in a timely manner. Furthermore, you should also be able to assist in planning and implementing effective business strategies. You should also be able to conduct in-depth market research and identify potential leads.
To be able to perform in this job role, you should have excellent communication and presentation skills. In addition to this, your strong negotiation skills will be a plus point. You should also be detail-oriented and have the ability to handle stressful situations.

MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES
Strategic/Technical/Operational:
1. Conventional channel management:
• Establish, develop and maintain relationships with customers in ETC after assessing their needs, purchasing method, and frequency of contact preferences
• Develop and execute plans to meet established sales goals and objectives while maintaining territory budget
• Complete planned customer visits to make product presentations to existing and prospective customers
• Provides industry and product knowledge to customers on segment specific value propositions and helps customize the existing product portfolio to their needs
• Assist marketing in the development and implementation of new strategies, tactics and tools for new market opportunities
• Monitor performance against objectives and performs analysis on territory opportunities to develop customer and product forecasts
• Monitor market, customer and competitor trends and advise management on methods to improve company competitiveness
• Support distribution partners including training, technical expertise of the ARDx product portfolio
• Understand tender policy/process and high ability of consulting to customers assigned.
2. Non-conventional channel management:
• Supporting the development and implementation of guidelines for the use of new products in GPs, small clinics, retailers & pharmacies... to reach a wider range of end customers.
• Aligning our activities with national and global initiatives, such as those targeting HIV, Tuberculosis, and Hepatitis.
• Deploy self-test products in non-conventional channel.
• Scanning and researching potential opportunities NGO, MOH, local and provinces across Southern, Vietnam to drive growth disproportionately.
• Working closely with key stakeholders to understand demand of rapid diagnostic kits for the year and mapping forecast plan for full year. This would include overseeing the implementation and monitoring of existing NGO's, CBO's projects

Internal Systems and Process:
• Comply with Abbott Corporate Policies and Procedures.
• Ensure all business activities are conducted professionally, aligned with regulatory and industry guidelines and are conducted in a manner consistent with Abbott’s Code of Conduct guidelines, and Abbott’s Anti-Corruption Policy

Customers:
• Responsible for exhibiting professional behavior with both internal/external business associates that reflects positively on the company and is consistent with the company’s policies and procedures.
• Maintain key NGO account and key opinion leaders in responsible market

Conduct:
• Ensure all activities carried out by self are in accordance with legislative employment policies and safety requirements and corporate policy
• Promote a standard of excellence for quality and customer focus at Abbott.
• Comply with ARDx’s policies and procedures
• Abide by ARDx Culture & Performance policies.
Job Requirements:
• Strong leadership, financial acumen, communication skills, and a passion for social impact are essential for this role.
• Minimum of 8+ years of healthcare industry experience (diagnostics, medical devices, pharmaceutical), with high customer interaction.
• Rich experience of healthcare, public health, pharmacy chain & NGOs operations, the internal and external policies and environment.
• Experienced professional individual contributor that can work under minimal supervision.
• Strong commercial acumen with ability to capture new opportunities and risk mitigate.
• Excellent communication skills and ability to build and maintain relationships at all levels in the organization and with external customers.
• Excellent organization skills with attention to detail and the ability to multi-task.
• Track-record of timely and high-quality project delivery.
• Proven excellence in both written and oral communication in Vietnamese Language and English.
• University degree in Biology, Pharmacy, or Medicine preferred.

Title: Human Resources and General Affairs Manager

Location: Red Bull Vietnam, Ha Noi Highway, Binh Thang Ward, Di An City, Binh Duong Province, Ha Noi Highway, Binh Thang Ward, Di An City, Binh Duong Province
Job Description:
Scope of responsibilities:

1. Develop, implement, and update Human Resources & General Affairs procedures to support Company in achieving strategic objectives.
2. Develop and implement effective recruitment activities.
3. Manage and develop employee performance & KPIs, including coaching, defining KPIs target, KPIs result and performance evaluation.
4. Analyze compensation and benefit trends, propose competitive salary structures, and implement strategies to attract and retain top talent.
5. Collaborate with department managers to identify the Company needs and improvement actions.
6. Implement succession planning to ensure continuity of leadership.
7. Organize employee engagement activities and events.
8. Manage the implementation of other Human Resources & General Affairs tasks.

Age: From 33 years old

Education:
Bachelor' degree or higher level in Human Resources Management, Business Administration, Law, Accounting, or a related field.

Experience:
• At least 5 years of experience in Human Resources & General Affairs field and 3 years in manager position of Human Resources & General Affairs department.
• Experience in a manufacturing company is preferred.

Soft skills:
• Good management skills such as leadership skills, people management skills, coaching skills, change management skills, planning skills, analytical skills, problem solving skills, etc.
• Good English communication skills.

Working Time: 8:00 – 17:00, Mon – Fri & alternative Sat

Working Location: Red Bull Vietnam, Ha Noi Highway, Binh Thang Ward, Di An City, Binh Duong Province (18km from Sai Gon bridge, 9km from Thu Duc intersection, 2km from Dong Nai bridge, 5km from National Highway 1K. The Office and Factory are located in a single location.)

* Benefits:
• Private health care insurance
• Attractive compensation, assessments and salary reviews yearly
• Service free Lunch Meal and potation
• Join the compulsory Social Insurance and Unemployment insurance on 100% salary under Labor Contract and according to the provisions of the Social insurance law
• Shuttle buses from Ho Chi Minh City to Company
• Opportunity to join annual activities of Company: Team-building, Year End Party, Woman’s day, Mid - Autumn, Tet holiday, Birthday present, ect.

Title: Engineering Services (Documentation & Process Support)
Company: Ascenx Technologies (Vietnam)
Location: 304/12/1 Bùi Đình Túy, P12, Quận Bình Thạnh, TP. HCM, Unit 5B, 5th Floor, Standard Factory Building, Road 14, Tan Thuan EPZ, Tan Thuan Dong Ward, District 7, HCMC, Vietnam
Job Description:
As a Engineering Document Support staff you will be responsible for a variety of tasks related to reviewing ECO (Engineering Change Order) and updating product information in global support services department in order to maintain serviceability (being able to provide necessary spare parts or service) to our customer’s tools in the semiconductor equipment manufacturing industry.
Roles and Responsibilities:
• Maintain and update product information in internal/external database systems.
• Review, revise and release product documentations and specifications for obsolescence replacements of legacy products such as engineering assemblies, cable harnesses, electrical components, and mechanical components.
• Review and verify documentations for Engineering Change Orders (ECO).
• Recheck and analyze the bill of materials (BOM) and product structure of parts, sub-assemblies and assemblies.
• Cooperate with other teams such as Sustaining Engineering, Documentation Support, Global Support Service, QA to control and release product documentaion onto the lifecycle management and manufacturing execution.
• Assist in publishing weekly and monthly reports of department performance in accordance to established standards.
Job Requirements:
• Nationality: Vietnamese
• Degree in English/Electronics/ Electrical/Mechatronics Engineering/Industrial Engineering or related subjects.
• Good written and verbal communication skills in English: ability to communicate with global customers and international colleagues.
• Proficient in Microsoft Office (Excel, Word, PowerPoint). Experience with MS Project/Access can be a plus.
• Natural talent for procedures, processes, and engineering documentation with attention to detail.
• Must be self-directed, able to handle multiple tasks with little direct supervision within tight deadlines.
• Knowledge of ECO, SAP, AutoCAD is preferred.
• Hand on industrial experience with professional engineering processes such as ECO is a plus.

● Làm việc trực tiếp với Giám đốc Marketing để cung cấp insights giúp hoàn thiện quy trình Sales-Marketing và xây dựng các kênh thu hút Leads hiệu quả.

● Phối hợp với các nhóm thiết kế về nội dung sáng tạo để tối đa hóa hiệu suất.

● Có kiến thức về SEO, khả năng research và nghiên cứu insight người dùng tốt. Có kỹ năng phân tích, đọc và thống kê số liệu.
● Khả năng giao tiếp tốt, thông minh, sáng tạo, đam mê công việc Marketing.

● Khả năng đọc và hiểu tiếng Anh.
